document_data.title: Putting the Dead to Rest
document_data.design: [[Cindy Moore]]{{Cite adventurers league/Putting the Dead to Rest|1}}
document_data.debut: November 2017 (CarnageCon/GameHoleCon/Goblins to Golems/Holiday around the Moonsea)
document_data.story arc:
''[[Adventurers League/Tomb of Annihilation|Tomb of Annihilation]]''
''The Rot from Within'' Trilogy
document_data.mainbody:
'''''Putting the Dead to Rest''''' is an adventure module set in the ''Forgotten Realms'' using the ''Dungeons & Dragons'' 5{{th}} edition ruleset. It is part of the ''[[Adventurers League/Tomb of Annihilation|Tomb of Annihilation]]'' series of adventures published for the [[Adventurers League|D&D Adventurers League]]. It focuses on [[Chult]], and is an adventure designed for three to seven 5{{th}}- to 10{{th}}-level characters. It is the third part of the ''The Rot from Within'' trilogy.

{{Quote|''The jungle has opened up and revealed her secrets—now is the time to act upon them. All signs point to a long-abandoned city as the source of the undead contagion, and so you have been called upon to venture within and put an end to it once and for all. Are you up to the task?''|}}
